prompts: Create a powerful fighting-type Pokemon with a muscular build and striking red and black colors.
Show me an agile bipedal Pokemon that can harness both fighting and dark energies for battle.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that blends fierce looks with an intense fighting spirit and unique color patterns.
Design a Pokemon that embodies strength and speed, featuring dynamic poses and a vibrant color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that excels in close combat, with distinct markings and a confident demeanor.
Give me a concept for a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats and has a fearsome appearance.
Make a striking illustration of a Pokemon that alternates between fighting and stealth tactics in combat.
